post:
Get IPv6 Ready Shared Hosting and go to next level, Improve your site SEO and accessibility.

Dewlance® is celebrating 10th Year Anniversary and we are providing huge discount on our any hosting plans.


Want to host your website on different datacenter in Montreal Canada, Australia, Maidenhead UK, Spain Europe, Indonesia and United States with 99.9% uptime guarantee? Choose Dewlance® hosting because of we host only few numbers of account per server.

We love to help our customers and gain trust, 90% customers are using our service since 2009 (9+ year) and their website speed is faster then many other leading providers.

Heavy Site/Forum/Blog Hosting?
For 50k Forum/Blog visitors per month, Our $4 to $5/mo plan is suitable, For heavy site contact us and we can provide you a dedicated hosting with dedicated resource at very affordable price. Try us. We are quality provider and we do not compromise with quality. We host many heavy site on separate dedicated server under $20/mo or less. (Depend on your site demand)


Available disk space: 1GB, 2GB, 5GB and custom plans are available. We host big websites but on a separate server so it can't affect our other customers and if you need more space/resource then contact us.


NEW - Unlimited Hosting - $2/m to $3/m - Note: This is different plan then $9/year plan and $2/m - $3/m server is more fast

I want to upgrade my shared hosting plan

Can you migrate my website?
- Free Migration, Just open a ticket and we will quickly migrate your site to our server.


Can you install Wordpress?
Yes and also you can do this yourself by using our Softaculous Autoinstaller software.



Note: Visitors and Google love websites which takes only few second and they hate slow website. Host your website on our server and Visitors/Google will love your website for quick loading speed.


Main Website: www.dewlance.com



Another Note: Providing a Quality server is our top priority, From next month we will also release a uptime statics in public.


Thanks.
